Fish & Seafood.name: Barracuda / Cheelavu / Thinda (Large) - Whole Fresh Sea Fish Cleaned & Gutted
Fish & Seafood.short_description: Freshly caught large barracuda, expertly cleaned and ready to cook.
Fish & Seafood.description: Our premium large barracuda is sourced from pristine waters, cleaned, gutted, and packed with care. Perfect for grilling, curries, or baking. Rich in protein and omega-3 fatty acids.

Fish & Seafood.name: Marine Sole Fish / Manthal / Repti (Large) - Whole Cleaned (480g to 500g Pack)
Fish & Seafood.short_description: Soft and succulent red snapper fillets, perfect for pan-fry or bake.
Fish & Seafood.description: Our boneless red snapper fillets are hand-cut from the freshest catch, offering a delicate flavor and tender texture. Ideal for light, healthy meals and elegant seafood recipes.

Fish & Seafood.name: Indian Salmon / Vazhmeen / Raavas / Gurjali (Medium) - Steaks (480g to 500g Pack)

Fish & Seafood.description: A complete whole fish, cleaned and prepared for your favorite recipes. Perfect for steaming, grilling, or baking with herbs and spices.

Fish & Seafood.name: White Pomfret / Silver Pomfret / Avoli - Whole (480g to 500g Pack)
Fish & Seafood.short_description: Large red snapper with firm, flaky flesh.
Fish & Seafood.description: This large catch is perfect for hearty seafood recipes. The mild yet rich flavor makes it versatile for Indian and continental cuisines.

Fish & Seafood.name: Large Marine Catfish / Etta Koori - Boneless Fillet (380g to 400g Pack)
